Stem: Woody at base, upper stems green, widely spreading
Leaves: Fan like, lobed with radiating veins, dark green.
Flowers: Pink to whitish with 5 notched petals often overlapping.
FruitSeeds: Capsule 1 cm in diameter, containing 8-12 non-hairy seeds.
DistinguishingFeatures: Distinguished from other *Malva* species by petals being same length as sepals.
Impacts: Competes with vegetable crops, host of pests and diseases.
